comment.author: 14279793@N06
comment._content: The man on the right, with his arm on the turtledeck, is Lt. Francis Brown Lowry. ... In Denver, Colorado, USA, the Lowry Field was named for him. ... It later became Lowry Air Force Base. ... When the AFB was closed it became the Lowry residential community. ... One of the hangars was made into "Wings Over The Rockies Air & Space Museum. ... I built a model of the plane in your photo. Click on image to view larger.
